reviewText: When I was growing up, people marveled at my flexibility.  I was as limber as a wet rag.  In the last five years, though, I had grown inactive and stiff & sore.  This particular flexibility work out with Wai Lana had an immediate effect, and I'm looking forward to regaining that heavenly flexibility!
She teaches very well. I have improved a lot in only 2 weeks. It's amazing how your body can be trained to do thing you never thought you could.
this is a great series if you want to stay flexible and keep toned and just plain healthy to practice
It took me beyond what I thought I was capable of; stretches me to my limit. My granddaughter attempts to do it with me and she does very well.  I will purchase more of Wai Lana tapes.
